FuncDef: The display mpls te gmpls tunnel command displays information about a specific or all GMPLS UNI tunnels on a device.
CLIs: display mpls te gmpls tunnel [ name <gmpls-tunnel-name> ] [ verbose ]
display mpls te gmpls tunnel ingress-lsr-id <ingress-lsr-id> egress-lsr-id <egress-lsr-id> session-id <session-id> lsp-id <lsp-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a GMPLS UNI tunnel with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the ingress LSR ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the egress LSR ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the session ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the local LSP ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: Ingress LsrId   Destination     LSPID In/Out Label     R Tunnel-name
R: Role, I: Ingress, T: Transit, E: Egress
<HUAWEI> display mpls te gmpls tunnel verbose
Ingress LSR ID      :  1.1.1.1         Egress LSR ID :  2.2.2.2
LSR Role            :  Ingress         Resv Style    :  SE
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about a specific or all GMPLS UNI tunnels on a device, run the display mpls te gmpls tunnel slave command.
